name: 王派桓
objective:
介紹與設計相關的心理學知識，由心理學各不同學門中擷取與產品及服務設計有關之內容，包括人類知覺與認知能力、認知發展階段、性格與社會互動、行為改變技術、研究與測試方法等，以協助未來的設計師瞭解產品服務與其使用者間的關係，建立對於使用者之基本瞭解與探索技能。

An introduction to various psychology knowledge and theories which help students to understand how product and service design interact with user behavior and cognition, and to explore the methods of user studies.  The lecture and practices will be derived from human perception and cognition, cognition development, personality and social interaction, behavior changing skills/theories, and research/testing methods.
